made my first Semi-auto transfer to mun and back on N1.

Is the American Pack going to be updated for .22? KSP is just not the same without Bobcat's contributions to the game.

Prowler_x1

yes, soon.

Prowler_x1

yes, soon.

Thanks BobCat....

If you open a donations link, I will be happy to deposit some "hard-cold-cash". You should be getting paid for your exceptional work. If you need a hand with mod maintenance, all you need to do is ask. You are not alone.

Best wishes and God-speed...

Thanks BobCat....

If you open a donations link, I will be happy to deposit some "hard-cold-cash". You should be getting paid for your exceptional work. If you need a hand with mod maintenance, all you need to do is ask. You are not alone.

I can't remember, but I think that's an iffy subject here on the forums.

Is it?

Interesting....

I can't remember, but I think that's an iffy subject here on the forums.

I took another look at the rules after your warning. From what I read no one is safe... Isn't ksp based on roleplay? Anyway lets get back on topic before we get kicked out....

2.2 Forbidden content

Messages which contain or link to the following are explicitly forbidden:

Piracy or discussion of piracy;

Discussions of a political, ideological or religious nature;

Adult content, such as nudity, sexually suggestive or explicit images, gore and drugs;

Harassment of other users or staff, this includes insulting, threatening, stalking, racism, sexism and impersonation as well as posting private conversations;

Vulgarity and profanity;

Conspiracy theories;

Links to commercial initiatives; and

Roleplaying.

Bobcat, when i downloaded the Sovietpack 1.9.1 beta, i tried to load the mir station/buran + energia in the VAB, but it said a part was missing: the buran manipulator When I checked the parts folder in bobcat gamedata folder, the folder of the Buran manipulator was empty. I checked the downloaded .zip and it was also missing in there. I downloaded it again and it was empty again. Can you fix this please?
The manipulator arm is a separate download.

Bobcat, when i downloaded the Sovietpack 1.9.1 beta, i tried to load the mir station/buran + energia in the VAB, but it said a part was missing: the buran manipulator When I checked the parts folder in bobcat gamedata folder, the folder of the Buran manipulator was empty. I checked the downloaded .zip and it was also missing in there. I downloaded it again and it was empty again. Can you fix this please?

Download the Robotic Arms Pack from spaceport. The Soviet Pack doesn't include the manipulator.
Technically it does, it just needs the romfarer Lazor system plugin to function.

Technically it does, it just needs the romfarer Lazor system plugin to function.

Sorry, that's right.
What about the An-225? It seems like almost everyone forgot about it after the update.
Ohh.. a what about the An-225? Something wrong?
I think he just meant that we haven't heard anything about it for a while now.
Ahh...next update Soviet pack be not soon.
are you going to add more science parts?
American pack updated to 0.22
Yes, I can now use the big SRB now!
Thank you BobCat.

American pack updated to 0.22

Did you change something with Ares 1 configs? It seems to be much better now. It's not wobbly and the 2nd stage works perfectly now. Anyway good job.

Did you change something with Ares 1 configs?

No. Squad fix a lot game trouble.
Thanks for the American Pack Update...... Incorporating it now.
Out of curiosity, if I was to rescale the orion pod for 3.75m, what would the rescale factor be?

If I may ask without getting shot at... as I'm going to get "Russia in Space" by Anatoly Zak as a birthday present, would you like some pics of the lunar base and martian projects (all using either N1 or Energia) BobCat?

Another question for which I might get shot at... any chance you'll ever make stuff like historical soviet satellites?

EDIT: to the user above me, check the size of IRL Orion capsule, multiply by 0.64 and you get its size in KSP, then divide 3.75 with its KSP size, and thats your rescale factor
